title: give me ____ I am a smurf
body: Anyone else think you should get a free dodge the moment someone says that

replies.body: Give me mid, I am diamond smurf. "Proceeds to go 0-10 and rage quit"

It's like a game developer hyping an upcoming game. 

They can only make fans expect too much, and ultimately be let down.
"_____ or feed" should earn the same dodge privilege.
fill or feed :)
Tried saying that once, my teammate got upset and called me a troll. I sat there dumbfounded! .-.

> [{quoted}](name=Quort,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7wgVhBrs,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2015-04-12T15:21:03.727+0000)
>
> Tried saying that once, my teammate got upset and called me a troll. I sat there dumbfounded! .-.

I've had that happen before as well. They took it so seriously to the point they were telling the other team to report me -_-
The average iq of this game is declining me thinks.
Afk or feed
damn canadians
Fill AND feed?
I say this everytime. Most of the time someone goes "BUT I CALLED FILL WTF".

afk or feed

proceeds to carry game
True story.
Relevant
What a cool guy.
all "I am a smurf" means is, I won't care about this game all that much because it is not my elo.
If that rule passes through I will just start typing "Give me a support, I am a smurf" every game and see if someone dodges.

Sorry to one up, but this should give dodging privilege. You say you can't do a certain role that well, but if they want you to you need a specific champion. True story below.

"Guys, I can play all roles but I'm super bad at ADC. If you do want me to adc, please don't ban Caitlyn"
Team leader proceeds to first ban Caitlyn
Team proceeds to pick everything but ADC
"Guys, I said I was a bad ADC, anyone willing to swap"
---silence----
"Alright...." Picks Jinx, second best adc
Goes 2/6/1 in first 15 minutes
"Report Jinx for feeding, she sucks"
Me: "..."
Goes 14/7/9 in next 15 minutes
Still loses game because Idk how to be good adc.

Worst game ever.

You kind of could have avoided that on your own end though by simply learning the adc role to a decent degree.

It's not super complex and there are many guides out there that can teach you.

Also it's common knowledge that before entering ranked, usually, you want to be able to play the other roles since you can't just dodge every game where you don't get your main (unless don't want to climb since dodging promos=lose).
This was earlier on. I can do Lucian/Jinx/Sivir pretty well, the rest are questionable.

The admirable thing is you was upfront that way there was no surprise but you know flamers are going to flame an find a reason why its your fault why the game was a loss an why the other players also contributed to the loss. Unfortunately its easier to point fingers at others than it is to point fingers at oneself. So many people live by this its stupid.

"give me mid i always win lane"

in game 0/10 10 minutes in

"omg jungler gank 4 me"

"this team is garb"
Lol, the bain of solo queue!

100% of the time they say they're a smurf for me.
100%.

"I am a ___ main and will carry."

"Omg -insert counterpick- is so OP"
What if he actually is a smurf and just wants to carry on his best role for an easy win? Would you give up an easy win?

And if they were lying? Would you want an easy loss?

If you're smurfing, you can do some roles at a lower level competently. A Diamond 1 smurf mid main could probably handle supporting at Bronze/Silver elo. Maybe not platinum, but it really depends.

But you can't just let someone get exactly what they want because they said that they're smurfing without any other substance, otherwise that gives other people an incentive to lie about smurfing so they get their role.
"Play on your main account so I can believe you"

Let me mid,im a diamond smurf...
cant even cs

The worst part is when they say that, you do give them mid, they do feed and ragequit, and then you look them up after the game, and they really were a smurf. I actually has a guy with like a 22-2 record ragequit because he died twice 1v1 early in lane.
No the worst is, "I CAN ONLY PLAY TOP" in ranked. Learn the other roles or stick to Teambuilder
I like letting them take their role, proceed to feed, then blame EVERYONE else and then rage quit.

Speaking as someone who is gold and sometimes plays with a buddy who is B5, and has seen other smurfs, the ones smurfing never actually say this.  They just take a role because they know that they can do well wherever.  Anyone who says "give me ______, smurf" is a liar who only knows how to play that one role and are mediocre at best
Give me Skins I am a smurf
Smurfs are just nuisances. Just let the new players play.

Says every Feeder I've ever played with.

literally 1/100 of the people who say that actually are smurfs, and the real surfs can handle another lane anyway.
"If you're Smurf, then you should be able to play any role. If you're a Smurf, you have no excuse."
I've got a smurf. It's level 11, and consists of champs I'm not sure fit my actual play style. Doesnt mean I can play ADC any better than I can on this account.

If you're smurfing, that implies that you're really good. Being really good at league means that you can play any role fairly well. Otherwise your're just not very good at the game and just want to pick on noobs, which is pathetic. If you think that you're exempt from having to play a role you don't want because you're a smurf, you're entitled, plain and simple.

The best is "Let me \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_, I am a gold smurf" when you're climbing silver.

It's like "Oh, really? I got to gold last season, so I actually know how bad golds are. You're actually using gold as a bragging right to try and get your role? Sorry I main \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ and I'm probably better than you, especially since you're stupid enough to try and get your role by bragging about being a gold smurf..... In mid silver." \*instalock\*

Of course, you say this in your head. You don't actually tell them. This is just your decision making process as you go over it in your mind.
/all give me kills i am a smurf
Every time I hear this I make sure to take the role they wanted if I can
If they truly are smurfing, then I believe that they should be able to play all roles, so it doesn't make much sense for them to claim they can only play one role.
Well, I'm leveling up a smurf at the moment so I can play ranked with my friends, but I suppose I'll avoid ever saying that!
If they can't carry in every role, then they aren't a smurf of more than a tier or -maybe- two higher than you. Them's the facts.
Feed or feed.=3

The TWO times this claim happened to be true:

21/1/10 {{champion:45}} after his gutting, BEFORE his buffs

I was like O_O

And 19/0/5 {{champion:53}} jungle

There are two kinds of smurfs. The ones who want a  particular position so they can stroke their ego by stacking up a high KDA against unsuspecting new players, 

and

the ones who type "Fill" into the champ-select chat box and try to help their teammates play better.

Free dodge? No. But, mute. And if you called that lane first, take that lane. Their self-esteem is not your responsibility.
